This webstory is a project that is part of the CS401 Applied Data Analysis course given by Professor Robert West. This project aims to analyze the CMU Movie Summary Corpus, a dataset consisting of movie summaries and metadata scraped from Wikipedia, and extract from it an interesting data story.

This project was conducted by 5 master students at EPFL, namely Romain Bianchi, Faye Delacr√©taz, Colin Hoffman, Octavio Profeta and Clara Wetzel, in the fall semester of 2023.
